description: It is an occasion where Hollywood's hottest couple turn up the heat.
title: Will Smith and Jada team up with Channing Tatum and Jenna at the Golden Globes
title_page: Will Smith and Jada team up with Channing Tatum  and Jenna at the Golden Globes | Daily Mail Online
text:
Forget a movie and dinner - date night in Hollywood is a rather more glamorous affair.
Will Smith and his wife Jada Pinkett Smith teamed up with the Tatums to steal the show on the Golden Globes red carpet on Sunday.
The Fresh Prince and his other half were very much the senior partners in the affair, with a string of box office blockbusters to their name.
Scroll down for video
Reaching boiling point: Channing Tatum, wife Jenna, Jada Pinkett Smith and her husband Will Smith led the way as Hollywood's hottest couples starred at the Golden Globes on Sunday
Will, who is up for a best actor in a movie drama award for Concussion, looked dapper in a classic tuxedo and leather shoes, while he chose to wear a trendily large bow tie.
The 47-year-old said the fact he was unaware of the dangers of American Football was one of the reasons he wanted to make the film, in which he plays a Nigerian doctor who fought against efforts by NFL to suppress his research on the brain damage suffered by professional players.
The father of three, whose oldest son played the sport, said: 'I think the big thing was as a parent I wasn't aware of the information so I was nervous that I sent my kids out into something I wasn't educated about.
See more Will Smith updates as he and his wife Jada embrace Channing Tatum and his wife
You look marvellous darling: The couples could not stop fawning over each other before finally posing up
Palpable passion: The old magic is still clearly there between Will and his wife of 19 years
Making them go green with envy: Jada was definitely an emerald in the rough with this arresting number
And it's goodbye from her: She flashed her enormous wedding sparkler as she bid fans farewell
'It was something that I had to do to deliver the information.'
Jada, 44, was looking spectacular in an emerald green dress, which boasted a split up the right leg that drew attention to her toned pins.
But they were far from the only glamour couple strutting their stuff at the showpiece occasion.
No you look better: No doubt the fawning pair could not stop insisting they had been outdone by their rival
He really is a Foxcatcher: Channing was smiling like the cat who got the cream as he posed with Jenna
She blue them all away: The dancer showcased her powerful and lithe physique in this ostentatious dress
The Wilde bunch: Olivia was joined by her trainer-wearing other half Jason Sudeikis
Rearly impressive: Cheeky girl Olivia drew attention to her delightful derriere in this form-fitting dress
No wonder she's smiling: The Cowboys And Aliens favourite had easily outshone most of her glamour rivals
Magic Mike favourite Channing Tatum, 35, and his wife Jenna Dewan Tatum both looked lovely, with the former staying on trendy by wearing a classic tux.
Supergirl star Jenna, who is the same age as her husband meanwhile was knockout in an ostentatious navy number that boasted an enormous puffy skirt.
But the red carpet top dogs were challenged by the sprightly Olivia Wilde, who attended with her beefcake comedy star fiance Jason Sudeikis.
Star phwoars: Harrison Ford and his wife Calista Flockhart looked fantastic
Little and large: Jason Statham was dwarfed by Rosie Huntington-Whiteley while Amy Adams gazed lovingly at Darren Le Gallo
Damon thrill: The Martian star Matt was overshadowed by his beautiful former barmaid wife Luciana
Cowboys And Aliens favourite Olivia, 31, looked marvellous in a form fitting burgundy number that drew attention to her delightful derriere.
Man of the moment Harrison Ford, 73, did not go Solo, as he brought along his glamorous much younger wife Calista Flockhart.
The 53-year-old looked fantastic in a lacy blue number with baroque embroidery on the torso.
Making him go Gaga: The good Lady was stared at lovingly on the red carpet by her beau Taylor Kinney
Golden oldies: Steve Carell, wife Nancy, Viola Davis, wearing Marchesa, and her husband Julius Tennon looked at least as good as the younger stars
They look super: Batman Begins star Christian Bale brought wife Sibi while Avengers favourite Mark Ruffalo attended with Sunrise Coigney
Glamour couple: Cate Blanchett showed off her handsome playwright husband Andrew Upton
